title: Forged from Fate: Scorched
description: War is coming, and with it Hell is breaking through to Earth's realm.Lexi has accepted her role as leader of the Mythic's - a race of beings on Earths realm that makes up every supernatural and mythological creature known to man. Lexi is the Phoenix, responsible for new souls finding their way to Earth and she is the Reaper, the one who allows souls to cross Earths realm to Heaven or Hell. Without her, the balance of good and evil and life and death will tip causing the destruction of all three realms.Just as Lexi has found her soulmate and is learning what it means to be Queen she is ripped away from it all. With her powers stripped away from her, Lexi must escape her enemies and fight her way through a foreign realm before it is too late.The fate of the realms is in Lexi's hands. Giving up is not an option and that means that Lexi will have to put her trust in the most unlikely allies so she can make it back home not only to her soulmate, but to save every living creature on Earth
author: Randi Liz Drake
